Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes the commissioner of taxation and finance to establish segment special equalization rates for certain school districts
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of taxation and finance to establish segment special equalization rates starting in fiscal year 2025 for the Amityville Union Free School District and Farmingdale Union Free School District for the segments of the districts in the towns of Babylon and Oyster Bay.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law in relation to authorizing the commissioner of taxation and finance to establish segment special equalization rates for certain school districts
